select oi.id, oi.code, oi.buy_user_id, oi.sell_user_id, oi.commodity_id, oi.total_price, oi.total_after_price, oi.pay_status, oi.pey_type, oi.logistics, oi.create_date, oi.pay_time, ui.code, ui.name as userName, ui.phone, coi.title, coi.name as commodityName, ct.name as typeName, coi.images, coi.price, coi.store_num, ei.id as evaluateId from order_info oi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.buy_user_id) left join commodity_info coi on (coi.id = oi.commodity_id) left join commodity_type ct on (ct.id = coi.type_id) left join evaluate_info ei on (ei.order_id = oi.id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.user_id = #{orderInfo.buyUserId}
AND ui.user_id = #{orderInfo.sellUserId}
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.code},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.userName},'%')
AND coi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.commodityName},'%')
AND ct.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.typeName},'%')
order by oi.create_date desc
